overview:
Peter Elarde is Senior Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer, responsible for all facets of Shutterflyâ€™s marketing efforts including customer and brand marketing, ecommerce, product management, user experience, creative services, and corporate communications. Peter joined Shutterfly in 2001 and most recently served as Vice President of the Services Business and Vice President of Product Marketing.

With more than 20 years of technology marketing and development experience, Peter was previously Vice President of Product Development for Achieva.com, a provider of online college prep programs. Before that, he was Vice President of Marketing and Sales with Tom Snyder Productions, a leading publisher of educational software, and spent several years with The Learning Company and Bain & Company.

Peter earned his MBA from Stanford University and his BS in Electrical Engineering from Yale University. In his free time, Peter enjoys running, hiking, spending time with family and taking pictures with his Nikon D50.
